title: [Old Ta'Faendryl, West Woods]
description: The path meanders into a small grassy clearing in the trees that is totally surrounded by trees and a thick growth of prickly brambles.  The stars twinkle down on the tiny meadow and the dim light of the moons picks out a fairy ring of mushrooms poking up through the grass.

The path meanders into a small grassy clearing in the trees that is totally surrounded by trees and a thick growth of prickly brambles.  A ray of light descends from the sky and into the center of the tiny meadow, illuminating the broken stump of a modwir tree, where the steady sound of humming indicates the presence of a busy hive of bees.
